content.en: Metabolic Network Analysis: Scientists have developed various algorithms and software tools to analyze and understand metabolic networks, which are crucial for studying cellular metabolism. These tools, such as YANA, SNA, Metabolica, BioMet Toolbox, TIGER, FASIMU, Von Bertalanffy 1.0, COBRA Toolbox v2.0, Flux-P, F2C2, Sybil, CoBAMP, K-FIT, FluTO, NetRed, and g2f, enable researchers to perform tasks like analyzing flux modes, gene expression, enzyme activities, stoichiometric analysis, genome-scale reconstruction, pathway prediction, metabolic flux analysis, pathway analysis, and more. By utilizing these algorithms, scientists can gain insights into how metabolic networks function and make predictions about cellular metabolism.
content.da: Analyse af Metabolske Netværk: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer og softwareværktøjer til at analysere og forstå metabolske netværk, som er afgørende for at studere cellulær metabolisme. Disse værktøjer, såsom YANA, SNA, Metabolica, BioMet Toolbox, TIGER, FASIMU, Von Bertalanffy 1.0, COBRA Toolbox v2.0, Flux-P, F2C2, Sybil, CoBAMP, K-FIT, FluTO, NetRed og g2f, gør det muligt for forskere at udføre opgaver som at analysere flux-modes, genekspression, enzymaktiviteter, stoikiometrisk analyse, genomskala rekonstruktion, pathway-prediktion, metabolisk fluxanalyse, pathway-analyse og mere. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer kan forskere få indsigt i, hvordan metabolske netværk fungerer og forudsige cellulær metabolisme.
